# 48-Hour Micro-Sprint — Checklist (Template)

- [ ] Santander RM email sent; call scheduled; 7-day follow-up set
- [ ] HDG call done; re-appraisal quote requested; custodian shortlist; insurance indication
- [ ] Vault dossiers compiled → single signed PDF → IPFS CID recorded
- [ ] Publish/refresh Bank Filings page (sections accurate; totals clean)
- [ ] One-pagers for flagship engines exported to “Licensing” folder
- [ ] Create IP Holdings LLC skeleton; populate Schedule of IP & Contracts
